name: Agility
description: You are quick to react, good at keeping your balance, and able to run at high speed.

name: Animals
description: You can calm mounts, tame wild beasts, and intuit an animal's intentions.

name: Fighting
description: You are able to use swords, axes, spears, and bows to defeat monsters.

name: Lore
description: You are very knowledgeable on a variety of subjects, from healing to ancient scripts.

name: Brawn
description: You are powerfully built, able to stand when others would fall, and lift great weights.

name: Scouting
description: You have desterous fingers and a sharp eye, suitable for all manner of larcenous pursuits.

name: Social
description: You have a strong sense of empathy, a silver tongue, and a gift for the gab.
